aws_ram_resource_share_accepter.description: Manages accepting a Resource Access Manager (RAM) Resource Share invitation.

share_arn.description: The ARN of the resource share.

invitation_arn.description: The ARN of the resource share invitation.

share_id.description: The ID of the resource share as displayed in the console.

status.description: The status of the resource share (ACTIVE, PENDING, FAILED, DELETING, DELETED).

receiver_account_id.description: The account ID of the receiver account which accepts the invitation.

sender_account_id.description: The account ID of the sender account which submits the invitation.

share_name.description: The name of the resource share.

resources.description: A list of the resource ARNs shared via the resource share.
